name: AAVE V3
description: Earn interest, borrow assets, and build applications

name: Spark
description: Spark is an at-scale stablecoin allocation engine capturing yield across DeFi, RWAs and exchanges. This yield is provided cross-chain to Savings USDS holders

name: Morpho Blue
description: Morpho Blue is a trustless and efficient lending primitive with permissionless market creation

name: Compound V3
description: Compound is an algorithmic, autonomous interest rate protocol built for developers, to unlock a universe of open financial applications.

name: Venus Core Pool
description: A Decentralized Marketplace for Lenders and Borrowers with Borderless Stablecoins.

name: Avalon Finance
description: The Liquidity Hub For BTC LSDFi and CeDeFi Lending

name: AAVE V2
description: Aave is an Open Source and Non-Custodial protocol to earn interest on deposits and borrow assets

name: Compound V2
description: Compound is an algorithmic, autonomous interest rate protocol built for developers, to unlock a universe of open financial applications.

name: Fluid Lending
description: An ever-evolving DeFi protocol and financial system of the future by Instadapp

name: Suilend
description: Suilend is a lending protocol on Sui, built by the team behind Solend.

name: Benqi Lending
description: BENQI is a non-custodial liquidity market protocol, built on Avalanche. The protocol enables users to effortlessly lend, borrow, and earn interest with their digital assets.

name: NAVI Lending
description: NAVI offers over collateralized lending/borrowing for SUI, USDC, USDT, wETH and wBTC and supports features like isolated pool, flash loan and soon to come crosschain lending/borrowing.

name: Save
description: Save (formerly Solend) is an algorithmic, decentralized protocol for lending and borrowing on Solana. Lending and borrowing has proven itself as being key in a DeFi ecosystem. However, current products are slow and expensive. On Solana, Solend can scale to being 100x faster and 100x cheaper. Solend aims to be the easiest to use and most secure solution on Solana.

name: Morpho AaveV3
description: Morpho's AaveV3-ETH Optimizer allows WETH-only transactions in ETH efficiency mode. It offers high-leverage WETH borrowing using stETH, USDC, WBTC, and DAI as collateral

name: ZeroLend
description: ZeroLend is a powerful decentralized lending protocol built on L2s. Based on Aave V3 and powered by Pyth and Chainlink

name: Moonwell
description: Moonwell is an open lending and borrowing DeFi protocol on Moonbeam & Moonriver.

name: Colend Protocol
description: Colend is a decentralized protocol that enables individuals to lend and borrow directly on the Core blockchain. It aims to advance the concept of Bitcoin-Fi.

name: Scallop Lend
description: Scallop is the pioneering Next Generation Money Market for the Sui ecosystem which emphasizes institutional-grade quality, enhanced composability, and robust security.

name: Liqwid
description: Decentralized interest rate curves for lending and borrowing on Cardano

name: Tectonic
description: Tectonic is a cross-chain money market for earning passive yield and accessing instant backed loans

name: EOS REX
description: REX (Resource Exchange) used for lending and borrowing CPU & NET resources and earning system protocol income (RAM fees, Name Bids, CPU/Net loans, PowerUp fees).

name: Nostra Money Market
description: Nostra Money Market enables everyday users to engage in permissionless non-custodial lending and borrowing on Starknet. Whether you're looking to earn passive income by lending your crypto or need access to funds through collateralized borrowing, Nostra Money Market provides a seamless financial experience tailored for you.

name: Yei Finance
description: Money Market on Sei Network

name: Fraxlend
description: Fraxlend is a lending platform that allows anyone to create a market between a pair of ERC-20 tokens. Any token part of a Chainlink data feed can be lent to borrowers or used as collateral

name: INIT Capital
description: The Liquidity Hook Money Market: Lend, Borrow, and Access Yield Strategies with Liquidity Hook.

name: Ionic Protocol
description: Ionic is a decentralised non-custodial money market protocol, supported by a comprehensive security monitoring and failsafe systems. Ionic gives users the complete control over their funds while providing best interest rates on Mode Network. Ionic aims for robust and long-lasting growth, cultivating exemplary conduct among all participants for the collective benefit of every stakeholder.

name: TakoTako
description: Lending project on Taiko

name: Silo Finance
description: Silo Finance creates permissionless and risk-isolated lending markets.

name: Hatom Lending
description: Hatom Lending Protocol is a decentralized lending and borrowing platform operating within the MultiversX Network.

name: Morpho Aave
description: Morpho is an on-chain peer-to-peer layer on top of lending pools. Rates are seamlessly improved for borrowers and lenders while preserving the same guarantees.

name: Dolomite
description: A next-gen money market and DeFi prime brokerage.

name: LayerBank
description: (previous LineaBank). A universal permissionless on-chain bank designed to thrive across the omni-chain ecosystem

name: TermFinance
description: TermFinance is a fixed rate borrow/lend protocol pioneering an auction model to originate fixed rate, fixed term crypto backed loans at scale.

name: Kava Lend
description: Cross-chain money market. Lend, borrow, and earn with your crypto.

name: Euler V2
description: Euler revolutionizes DeFi by letting any asset become collateral for a lending market. Lenders and borrowers get market leading risk-adjusted rates. Builders can create and manage markets exactly how they want them, with institutional-grade security.

name: Mendi Finance
description: Mendi Finance is a decentralized lending protocol for individuals, institutions and protocols to access financial services. It is a permissionless, open source protocol serving users on Linea. Users can deposit their assets, use them as collateral and borrow against them.

name: Lenfi
description: Open-source and decentralized Lending and Borrowing protocol.

name: Curve LlamaLend
description: Curve's isolated lending market infrastructure enables users to borrow or lend using stablecoin $crvUSD along with permissionless markets created from crypto-tokenized collaterals, where markets may be created permissionlessly. Positions are managed passively: if the collateral's price decreases, the system automatically sells off collateral in a ‘soft liquidation mode’. If the collateral's price increases, the system recovers the collateral.

name: BiFi
description: BiFi (abbreviation of Bifrost Finance) is the decentralized finance platform built on Bifrost, the universal multichain middleware.

name: Swaylend
description: Experience lightning-fast, low-cost lending and borrowing on Fuel.

name: UwU Lend
description: UwU Lend is a liquidity market that offers depositing and borrowing. Users earn interest on deposits and pay interest to borrow

name: Venus Isolated Pools
description: Isolated Pools are made up of separate collections of assets with tailored risk management configurations

name: Flux Finance
description: Flux Finance is a decentralized lending platform supporting permissioned assets

name: zkLend
description: zkLend is an L2 money-market protocol built on StarkNet, combining zk-rollup scalability, superior transaction speed, and cost-savings with Ethereum's security. The protocol offers a dual solution: a permissioned and compliance-focused solution for institutional clients, and a permissionless service for DeFi users - all without sacrificing decentralisation

name: REX Staking
description: REX is short for “Resource Exchange” and is a marketplace that allows for the risk-free leasing of network resources (CPU & Network)

name: Zest
description: Zest Protocol is an open-source, on-chain lending platform built for Bitcoin, allowing users to earn or borrow against their BTC

name: Kinza Finance
description: A reliable lending protocol is core to a solid DeFi ecosystem. Kinza focuses on security relentlessly, and aims to connect demand and supply of liquidity to create the best on-chain money market.

name: Mars Protocol
description: Mars is a multichain credit protocol enabling borrowing and lending primitives in the Cosmos. With Mars v2, the protocol introduced "Rover credit accounts" to Osmosis. Much like Binance subaccounts, credit accounts act as transferrable NFT containers where users can deposit assets, and use them as collateral for borrowing, spot or margin trading, leveraged yield farming, and hedging — all with a single liquidation point

name: EVAA Protocol
description: The first decentralized lending protocol on TON that lets users lend or borrow assets without going to a centralized intermediary.

name: Deepr Finance
description: Discover the Potential of Decentralized Lending Bringing a Secure and Efficient Lending Platform to Shimmer

name: Vesu
description: The Future of Lending on Starknet - Vesu is a modular and permissionless lending protocol allowing anyone to earn, borrow and create markets.

name: Lendle
description: Decentralized, non-custodial lending and borrowing market on MantleNetwork.

name: Alpaca Finance 2.0
description: Alpaca Finance offers a simple way for both beginners and professionals to earn high yields in DeFi through Lend & Stake

name: Optim Finance
description: Optim Finance is a suite of DeFi protocols focused on yield optimization for the Cardano blockchain. OADA is our flagship product, offering superior yields and enhanced DeFi composability.

name: Impermax Finance
description: Impermax is a DeFi ecosystem that enables liquidity providers to leverage their LP tokens

name: Bonzo Finance
description: The Liquidity Layer of Hedera: An open source, non-custodial lending protocol based on Aave

name: Seamless Protocol
description: A decentralized, non-custodial liquidity market that creates a more seamless experience for Suppliers and Borrowers.

name: Rho Markets
description: Liquidity Layer on Scroll_ZKP. Lending & Yielding

name: Iron Bank
description: Iron Bank is a decentralized protocol to protocol lending platform. It allows trusted protocols to borrow funds without posting collateral via whitelisting. It is helping build a better and safer DeFi lending ecosystem, by driving capital efficiency as the liquidity infrastructure and backbone for DeFi and CeFi.

name: MethLab
description: MethLab is a liquidation-free, and oracle-less lending/borrowing protocol that enables fixed-rate/fixed-term positions on Mantle

name: Trustin Finance
description: Bitcoin security-equivalent Layer 2 based on BitVM, Permissionless lending protocol

name: AAVE V1
description: Earn interest, borrow assets, and build applications

name: Sumer.money
description: Sumer is a cross-chain synthetic assets protocol with a lending and borrowing market, deployed simultaneously on a network of supported chains. Sumer enables the creation of SuTokens (Synthetic Assets of USD, ETH and BTC) to provide a credit card-like experience to users. SuTokens break cross-chain liquidity & smart contract communication barriers while enabling non-custodial, highly decentralized & secure cross-chain transfers

name: Native Lend
description: Native is crypto's invisible DEX layer. Each DEX is owned by an individual project and embedded into that project's UI, with access to liquidity across the entire network.

name: Notional V3
description: Fixed rate lending on Ethereum

name: Wing Finance
description: A Credit-based, cross-chain DeFi Platform.

name: Tarot
description: Protocol users can deposit LP tokens in Tarot Vaults and receive Vault Tokens. The deposited LP tokens are then farmed and earned rewards are automatically converted to additional LP tokens and reinvested.

name: Teller
description: Leverage any crypto asset as collateral, with time-based liquidation. Fixed APR. Flexible durations. Instant loans on Ethereum & Polygon.

name: Sturdy V2
description: Sturdy enables anyone to create a liquid money market for any token. Sturdy uses a novel two-tier architecture to isolate risk between assets while avoiding liquidity fragmentation. The base layer consists of risk-isolated pools; aggregation built on top enables lenders to select which collateral assets can be used as collateral for their deposits.

name: Parallel Lending
description: Parallel Lending is a decentralized lending protocol enabling users to borrow and lend using both Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) and Fungible Tokens (FTs). It offers the ability to leverage untapped capital for additional investments while generating yields. Notably, Parallel stands out as the pioneer in cross-margin NFT Finance, allowing users to borrow and lend ERC-721 and ERC-20 tokens within a unified account and credit line. This protocol empowers asset holders to access liquidity and earn yields effortlessly across their entire asset portfolio, offering a user-friendly yet robust solution

name: Strike
description: The Strike App enables users access to a fully decentralized money market powered on Ethereum 24/7/365 with a user-interface, api, or smart contracts.

name: Increment Lending
description: Decentralized Money Market for fungible tokens on Flow.

name: Shoebill V2
description: LST Collaterizable Leverage Lending Protocol maximizing yield or utilize asset for better opporunity

name: IOLEND
description: IoLend is the first lending and borrowing protocol on the IOTA EVM. It is designed to aggregate the most attractive yield opportunities on the network

name: Hover
description: Hover is a non-custodial, enterprise-quality lending protocol on the Kava EVM. Combining integrated tokenomics and continuous market surveillance, Hover offers a novel platform to lend, borrow, and earn rewards

name: Phiat Protocol
description: An Aave v2 fork on PulseChain with noval design of risk control and governance token staking

name: Kinetic
description: Kinetic is an ecosystem-tailored money market enhanced with an optional work-to-earn element.

name: Pando Rings
description: Pando Rings: a decentralized protocol where you can lend or borrow cryptocurrencies
